measured_by: 18-item self-report questionnaire on changes in cognitive functions (5-point scale)
justification: “Eighteen items were used to ask about changes in cognitive functions in the following categories… The participants answered on a 5-point scale.”
“Post-traumatic stress was measured by the ITQ (International Trauma Questionnaire [24]) which examines 6 core PTSD symptoms.”

measured_by: 6-item Neuroticism subscale of the Big Five Inventory-2-Short form (BFI-2-S)
justification: “Neuroticism was measured by a 6-item subscale from the BFI-2-S (Big Five Inventory-2-Short form [25]).”
